body:
I've seen a lot of threads being locked because of this:



Attention seeking status updates are prohibited. The Avicus Network forum is not designed to be a social network to keep others up to date with what is going on in your personal or online life, but rather an environment where all users are involved in discussions that pertain to larger and more relatable topics.

Posting prestige threads IS ATTENTION SEEKING, people do it for people to say gratz for them, it's also basically saying what's going on their online life.
body_tagged:

replies.body: Well, to be honest I don't see the problem with leaving or prestige threads. Leaving threads are so that people know that you're leaving and that you won't be online. It's different if the person is only leaving for a few days or weeks. With prestige/birthday threads, the players are expressing their happiness. If you don't care for the thread, don't click or post on it. This isn't directed at TNT, or any specific person .Just my 2 cents..

replies.body:
Although I have done one myself, I now sort of regret that I did it. 
In my opinion, only prestige five should be allowed to showcase on the forums. Every other prestige should just be a big game event, not enough for a forum post. 
Since there are very few people with prestige five in any gamemode, while there are hundreds with prestige 1-4, there's really no point saying you got prestige 1-4.
replies.body_tagged:
Although I have done one myself, I now sort of regret that I did it. 
In my opinion, only prestige five should be allowed to showcase on the forums. Every other prestige should just be a big game event, not enough for a forum post. 
Since there are very few people with prestige five in any gamemode, while there are hundreds with prestige 1-4, there's really no point saying you got prestige 1-4.

replies.body: I think threads for prestige 1 & 5 should be kept. Prestige 1 is your first stepping stone. While prestige 2-4 are just in between 1 & 5. Prestige 5 is a long-term goal that should have a post if wanted. Overall, I think prestige 1 & 5 you should be able to make a post, but prestige 2-4 you shouldn't.

replies.body:
Dear doozie ,

about 20 mins ago u banned me.
i am here to appeal. I understand I was using caps and called a player a hacker. But you warned me twice then just randomly banned me for 1 week.  If part of the ban were the warns and kicks from peachy, there was still no point to unban me. I abused /report ONCE and I reported a hacker who hit me 9 blocks away from me. I am not trying to be rude but if u can plz unban me that would be great summer is almost over and when I get unbanned that's my last week of it. 

Thanks, cyrus_zide

replies.body: Ok look. To all those people saying that "ohhh if prestiege is deleted, its the end of the world and stuff" stop. Look i understand. It is an achievement for you personally and oyu would want to post it on the forums. I dont mind if you post a 1st prestiege and 5th prestiege because those are really important. However, it is a bit spammy that people make a thread that's saying "ohh i got a 2nd prestiege yayayyayay" then "ohhh i got another prestiege! 3rd prestiege!!!! yayayyay" and so on. IT is annoying isn't it? If your not conviced, let me put it this way. It's like oyur on instagram where You gotta post something jajajaj and you end up spamming. Just because it's an achievement, doesn't mean you have to blabber it all out in the forums for EVERY SINGLE PRESTIEGE. (1 and 5th prestiege is okay)
replies.body_tagged: Ok look. To all those people saying that "ohhh if prestiege is deleted, its the end of the world and stuff" stop. Look i understand. It is an achievement for you personally and oyu would want to post it on the forums. I dont mind if you post a 1st prestiege and 5th prestiege because those are really important. However, it is a bit spammy that people make a thread that's saying "ohh i got a 2nd prestiege yayayyayay" then "ohhh i got another prestiege! 3rd prestiege!!!! yayayyay" and so on. IT is annoying isn't it? If your not conviced, let me put it this way. It's like oyur on instagram where You gotta post something jajajaj and you end up spamming. replies.body:
prestiege threads are ok if they are your first or last prestiege. ._.


besides, it is een against the rules. LOOK

E. FORUM RULES

  1. Do not encourage "flame wars" or other inflammatory discussions.
  2. Stay on topic in discussions. Posts not relating to the topic will be deleted without hesitation.
  3. Bumping topics is highly discouraged. If you believe a topic has not received the popularity you had hoped, you may bump the post with updates or new ideas that pertain to the topic.
  4. Inappropriate images and links, as mentioned in §A.2, will not be tolerated.
  5. Posts that discuss details regarding other Minecraft servers is not allowed. Certain sections of these posts may be obscured if the post exhibits any text that could be considered advertising.
  6. Titles should be formatted properly and directly relate to the topic you wish to discuss. Staff members reserve the right to modify any misleading, inaccurate or objectionable titles to create an easier and more streamline experience for users.
  7. Discussions surrounding personal updates is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continually uses the discussions for this purpose alone.
  8. Attention seeking status updates are prohibited. The Avicus Network forum is not designed to be a social network to keep others up to date with what is going on in your personal or online life, but rather an environment where all users are involved in discussions that pertain to larger and more relatable topics.

replies.body: Prestiges are one of the main reasons why players come back to Avicus, they are an actual goal that you have to reach, and it is both fun and competitive between players. If prestiges are removed, I'm sure that Avicus will lose a lot of players. If they are removed, there is no goal, and we would just be playing the games without something to look forward to. Removing prestiges is a terrible idea, in my opinion.
replies.body_tagged: Prestiges are one of the main reasons why players come back to Avicus, they are an actual goal that you have to reach, and it is both fun and competitive between players. If prestiges are removed, I'm sure that Avicus will lose a lot of players. If they are removed, there is no goal, and we would just be playing the games without something to look forward to. Removing prestiges is a terrible idea, in my opinion.

reply_to.body_tagged: Prestiges are one of the main reasons why players come back to Avicus, they are an actual goal that you have to reach, and it is both fun and competitive between players. If prestiges are removed, I'm sure that Avicus will lose a lot of players. If they are removed, there is no goal, and we would just be playing the games without something to look forward to. Removing prestiges is a terrible idea, in my opinion.

replies.body:
I don't get what the big fuss is to be honest... I'm kind of in the middle.

 I personally never click on prestige threads just because I am not that interested, so I don't get why yous can't do the same.

Go or stay, it does not really affect me since for me they basically don't exist anyway. I still do not think it is necessary to ban them though... At the rate we are going all threads will be banned ;-; So I think everyone just needs to chill out as I also don't understand how some people seem to have a fiery hatred for these threads.. They are just threads that someone wants to how off and celebrate their achievement!

I say just let them be and if you don't like it then don't click on it. There are not that many anyway.   
I mean I don't like chewing gum, so I do not eat it. Yet do I try get it banned in my country? No because that is unfair to the people who enjoy it.

replies.body: Maybe there should be only one "Prestige"-thread where you write when you've got prestige 1,2,3, 4 or maybe even 5 instead of all these threads.

replies.body:
So, I've kinda ignored this thread for a while. I really don't know why, but I feel it's time to make my mark on this.

I'm more in favor of staying in the middle of this, specifically just allowing Prestige 1 - 5 threads. Prestige 2 - 4 threads can go take a hike for all I care. But, as someone said before, Prestige 1 is a huge "stepping stone" into the Avicus community (especially for anyone that isn't a regular on TS or Skype, like myself). Not only that, but after the hours upon hours spent working towards that goal (or eight months in my case), it feels like a huge gratification to finally hit that point, at least for me, because I sure as all heck didn't spend twenty-four hours camping on Quintus (which still wouldn't get you Prestige anyways, unless you're a donor).

Also, I really, really doubt that absolutely no one cares about prestige threads at all. You say it like it's fact, but I'm fairly sure that, while maybe 50% or more may not care about them, there will always be a minority that differs, and finds threads like that fun. It's not like the forums need a little more humor anyways, because all I tend to see nowadays are Map Submissions, Suggestions, the occasional game thread, and some discussion threads over irl events.

I still believe that prestige 2,3, and 4 threads should be banned, but 1 and 5 are fine, because they ARE a huge milestone.

And since I don't see many prestige threads anymore, i don't see a reason for it to have a sub-topic. I think that it should be placed as a little addition for when you are making a post.
